name: Bone Rush
description:
A race for the throne against the reawakened pretender.

Produced by The Calcium Area.

The Game:

"My dear,

I feel the King nearing his death bed, and it is time for you to prove your worth. Those troublesome six, all vying for the throne, but I know how you can overcome this.

I feel a disturbance in this wretched crypt - you don't have much time."

Hack 'n' Slash through a randomly-generated crypt, where you can face the boss at any time. Put a stop to the ritual and absorb its strength. With each passing second, the boss comes closer to completing the ritual and breaking free of its chains.

Are you quick enough to defeat Tormir Von Ludwig?

How to play:

Download the .zip file and extract it, then run the Bone Rush Unity executable.

To reset the game, simply return to the main menu and click Play.
